short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remembers the viewer window's size and position when launched with an encrypted URL from an integrated zero-footprint worklist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The eUnity SSO Window Positioner remembers the eUnity viewer window's size and position when eUnity is launched with an encrypted URL from an integrated system such as a zero-footprint worklist, EMR system, or patient portal.

As the user move and resize an eUnity viewer window, the window position and size are recorded. The next time an eUnity viewer is launched, the last recorded window position and size will be applied.

Note: This extension is not required for the eUnity Viewer to function properly. It is an optional extension that gives eUnity users additional control over window positioning.
